articles.description: Former India all-rounder Yuvraj Singh met and greeted India stars, including Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, after he was felicitated by the Punjab Cricket Association in Mohali on Tuesday, September 20.
articles.content: Harbhajan Singh posed with Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann, who was also in Mohali to felicitate the World Cup heroes
